* Australia Test captain Pat Cummins recently participated in the Major League Cricket in the USA.
* No further details about his performance or experience in the tournament are mentioned in the article.

The rest of the article focuses on Cummins' plans for the upcoming cricket season, including his preparation for the India Test series and potential participation in the Sheffield Shield and ODI series against Pakistan.

* Shakib Al Hasan, a veteran all-rounder from Bangladesh, has been playing in the Major League Cricket tournament in the USA after the Men's T20 World Cup and Global T20 Canada League.

Note: The article does not provide any additional information about the Major League Cricket tournament beyond Shakib Al Hasan's participation in it. The rest of the article focuses on Bangladesh's squad selection for the upcoming Test series against Pakistan.
